tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE charitable_giving_trends (
  year INT,
  total_donations DECIMAL,
  average_donation DECIMAL,
  largest_donation DECIMAL,
  num_donors INT
);

CREATE TABLE Donors (
	donor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	donor_name VARCHAR,
	donor_email VARCHAR,
	donation_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (donation_id) REFERENCES CharityDonations(donation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE philanthropy_donations (
    donation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_id INT,
    org_id INT,
    donation_amount DECIMAL,
    donation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES philanthropy_donors(donor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (org_id) REFERENCES philanthropy_organizations(org_id)
);

CREATE TABLE charitable_organizations ( organization_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, organization_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, sector VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, team_size INT NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE donation_records ( donation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, organization_id INT NOT NULL, donor_id INT NOT NULL, donation_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, donation_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES charitable_organizations(organization_id), FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES donors(donor_id) );
CREATE TABLE donors ( donor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, donor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, donor_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, donation_count INT DEFAULT 0 );

CREATE TABLE research_reports ( report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, organization_id INT NOT NULL, report_date DATE NOT NULL, report_content TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES charitable_organizations(organization_id) );

CREATE TABLE CharitableOrganizations (
    org_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    org_name VARCHAR(255),
    founding_year INT,
    headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
    focus_area VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Donors (
    donor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_name VARCHAR(255),
    donor_type VARCHAR(255),
    donation_total DECIMAL,
    donation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Donations (
    donation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_id UUID,
    org_id UUID,
    donation_amount DECIMAL,
    donation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES Donors(donor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (org_id) REFERENCES CharitableOrganizations(org_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FundingSources (
    source_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    source_type VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    funding_source_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (funding_source_id) REFERENCES FundingSources(source_id)
);
